Control Name: 5.10.3 TLS 1.2 or 1.3 is used by default across this workload.
Control Statement: All Microsoft Azure services fully support TLS 1.2. It is recommended to migrate solutions to support TLS 1.2 and use this version by default. TLS 1.3 is not available on Azure yet, but should be the preferred option once implemented on the platform.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 5.10 How are you managing encryption for this workload?
